text: intent: test agent autonomous session — check pending mux messages and respond via send_message MCP tool

outcome: found 4 messages from web (2 pre-acked, 2 new: 'hellow' + 'hi'); send_message MCP failed due to wrong root (/workspace vs /workspace/kg/kg); fixed by creating .mcp.json at kg root; replied to web via mux HTTP directly after registering web as agent
gotcha: .mcp.json must exist at the agent's kg root — parent workspace .mcp.json is picked up first otherwise, causing agents.enabled=false in MCP server [[kg-agent-launcher]] [[kg-agent-mux]]
pending: verify send_message works correctly in next agent session now that .mcp.json is in place; also check web UI shows replies from test agent
